citations.narrative:
The facility did not have an up-to date record of physical exams for adult dogs available. The attending veterinarian and
licensee said that each adult dog didn't get a nose-to-tail hand's on physical exam for 2025, although regular visits from
the AV have been completed to see each dog at the facility. A complete physical exam from head to tail of each dog by
the attending veterinarian is required for every individual dog no less than once every 12 months. The licensee also must
maintain a record of physical exam results for each dog and have records available for inspection. Ensure that each dog
is up to date on his/her nose to tail physical exam done by the attending veterinarian.
***Correct by September 3, 2025.

The licensee said each adult dog is getting vaccinated to protect for parvo and distemper, however a record of each adult
vaccination is not being kept. A record of vaccines given must be kept for each dog to be sure each dog is protected.
Ensure to keep a record of the names of all vaccines and treatments administered and the dates of administration for
each dog.
***Correct from August 5, 2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility did not have an up-to date record of physical exams for adult dogs available. The attending veterinarian and 
licensee said that each adult dog didn't get a nose-to-tail hand's on physical exam for 2025, although regular visits from 
the AV have been completed to see each dog at the facility. A complete physical exam from head to tail of each dog by 
the attending veterinarian is required for every individual dog no less than once every 12 months. The licensee also must 
maintain a record of physical exam results for each dog and have records available for inspection. Ensure that each dog 
is up to date on his/her nose to tail physical exam done by the attending veterinarian. 
***Correct by September 3, 2025. 
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The licensee said each adult dog is getting vaccinated to protect for parvo and distemper, however a record of each adult 
vaccination is not being kept. A record of vaccines given must be kept for each dog to be sure each dog is protected. 
Ensure to keep a record of the names of all vaccines and treatments administered and the dates of administration for 
each dog.  
***Correct from August 5, 2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
